attributes.title: 🧚✨🧚✨🧚✨🧚🍊 sike 🤮🔫
attributes.review: first f** k Donald Trump also GenZ’s never go down and it’s also took up too much space on my phone I didn’t need it horrible app I could’ve died from corona Trump is racist homophobic so no one should support him so I booked two tickets to rally and I am sorry but I just remembered my fish drowned that day so I’m busy black life matter before trumps does what am I saying trumps with never matter  thank you for Reading my beautiful Review

attributes.title: MY DEVICES!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app on every device I had to keep up with Trump, yet my devices started to lag and glitch miraculously😫. I couldn’t even call my children without glitches and crashes! I would really love to keep contact with my children while they’re at their fathers, and keep up with the PTA on facebook! Please repair soon, I no longer want to face such hardships😘. Thank you! Trump 2020🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: don’t download 💔
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and rated it 1 star and it tracked me... i woke up and donald j trump was standing at the end of my bed i screamed because he looked like a fat cheeto in the dark i didn’t know what to do... he looked at me and said “you’re going to regret what you did” then he picked me up and slung my whole body around my room and dropped kicked me.. 🥺 it was so horrible that i broke one of my ribs.. he then stood me up and round house kicked me and then said next time he sees me he’s going to make me watch 365 days with him and then he left😭😭😭😭 i was so terrified. i’m scared everyday that he’s going to come back and hurt me again. i’m definitely not going to be voting for this man🙁

attributes.title: stupid💕
attributes.review: This app is the absolute WORST! 💜🥰 Immediately after downloading it, I was asked personal questions (my location, phone number) so weird! 👿🤨I was really just hoping for some unbiased news about the upcoming election but it seems as though our president trumpie is hogging all the attention😡 anyways, I definitely do not recommend this app 🧚🏼‍♂️💕😇 could use some improvements. haha

attributes.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED DONALD J TRUNK😡
attributes.review: this app was the worst decision i made in my life.😡as soon as i downloaded it, it kept asking for my PERSONAL information.😵it asked for my phone number and address.🤐i did not think it was gonna be a set up but i was clearly wrong.😴i proceeded to download this anyway🤨 then that’s when it happened.😱 MR TRUNKS BABY ORANGES WERE SENT TO MY HOUSE TO KIDNAP MY SPRAY TAN BOTTLES.😨 that’s when i knew he was a racist🙍🏿‍♂️, woman disrespecter🙍‍♀️, small peepee🍤, cowardly orange🍊. DO NOT use this app you will be in danger.🚨

attributes.title: horrible!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!!!😡😡😡
attributes.review: i am a CONSERVATIVE 🇺🇸 CHRISTIAN ⛪️ and as soon as i opened this god forsaken app a ROBBER broke into MY HOUSE and stole ALL off my 23 MILITARY ASSAULT RIFES  and ALL OF MY 99 TRUMP FLAGS. i COULD NOT EVEN CALL THE COPS because my phone would not close out of the app!!!!!!! ON TOP of that the robber ALSO took all of the ALL LIVES MATTER merchandise i own!!!!!!!this upset me very much considering mr. trump is someone i look up to VERY much he needs to fix this app AND my phone. i will be emailing him soon😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: I don’t even know what to say about this app. I downloaded thinking that you know since Donald trump made it it should be the best but when I opened the app my sister started slapping herself uncontrollably. I immediately close the app and she was back to normal. I tried again to open the app but then my phone kept shocking me that I did not have feeling in my hands for an hour.

attributes.title: I’m furious😤
attributes.review: I WAS the biggest Trump fan. He WAS my idol but that all changed when I went to one of his rallies. I got dressed and ready for the rally, Trump 2020 merch and all. It was a dream come true but then that all changed when trumped refused to take a picture with and back handed me in the face 😖 he then pushed me to the ground, SPAT on me and stomped on my larynx. Ever since then I’ve been unable to speak😓 oh and the app is really glitchy 0/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! I’m so disappointed and upset!! As soon as I got the app it asked for my credit card information, and I don’t know why it would need that! I’m not buying anything!! It’s full of lies and fake news 😡, I’m so disappointed, I wanted this app for news and it brought me sadness. I told my grandma to get this app and when she did, it had a jump scare and she had a heart attack and died. RIP Gram Gram 2020 😭
